name: Boxy's Job
description:
(This is a public BETA, the game is still going through changes and adding new content)

Boxy's Job is an AI that is figuring out how to break all the *Blue Boxes* on every level by redirecting *Red Balls* with his excellent tool...

But something is off...

There are things they don't want Boxy to know, but who are they to begin with?

Controls: [ Arrows ] - Movement [ Space ] - Jump [ Z ] - Interact [ X ] - Attack
